video.title: Elite
video.synopsis: When three working-class teens enroll in an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.

episodes.synopsis: After a public high school collapses, the builder tries to repair its image by paying for three impacted students to attend an exclusive private school.
episodes.title: Welcome

episodes.synopsis: A school project brings Marina and Samuel closer, and inspires Guzmán to try and win over Nadia. Meanwhile, Christian is shocked by a revelation.
episodes.title: Desire

episodes.synopsis: Samuel throws a party, where Nano makes a move on Marina and spiked punch affects more than one couple. Nadia is hurt by what she learns about Guzmán.
episodes.title: Saturday Night

episodes.synopsis: Guzmán tries to earn Nadia's forgiveness. Polo and Christian bond at a gala. Lu bribes her teacher. To pay his debt, Nano must complete a dark mission.
episodes.title: Love is a Drug

episodes.synopsis: Marina gives Nano a way to pay his debt. Lu intentionally leaks a secret in front of Nadia. Omar learns Ander told his friends about the two of them.
episodes.title: Everyone Lies

episodes.synopsis: Nano learns one watch holds a secret. Marina's pot stash is found. News of a pregnancy raises suspicions. Christian is offered fame if he does a favor.
episodes.title: Everything Will Be Okay

episodes.synopsis: Carla suspects Marina is involved in the theft. Omar's father makes plans for his son. After learning his sister’s secret, Guzmán seeks revenge.
episodes.title: Everything Explodes

episodes.synopsis: The last moments before the murder unfold. Christian makes a tough decision. The police arrest a suspect. Guzmán becomes reckless with grief.
episodes.title: Assilah

episodes.synopsis: New students start school at Las Encinas as Guzmán continues to mourn his sister and Christian struggles with his secret. A classmate goes missing.
episodes.title: 20 hours missing

episodes.synopsis: Seeking the truth about Marina's death, Samuel attempts to seduce Carla. Lu's new friend, social media guru Cayetana, hosts an impromptu party.
episodes.title: 34 hours missing

episodes.synopsis: Polo and Ander have a heart-to-heart. Nadia gets creative to stop Guzmán from drinking too much and doing drugs. Rebeca's mother offers Samuel a job.
episodes.title: 36 hours missing

episodes.synopsis: Pressured by his friends, Polo's guilt overwhelms him. Cayetana's mother threatens to reveal her secret. Ander and Guzmán argue with their partners.
episodes.title: 59 hours missing

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca teases Cayetana with what she's learned. The Halloween party takes a troubling turn. Samuel walks in on a shocking scene.
episodes.title: 63 hours missing

episodes.synopsis: Lu blackmails Nadia, and Samuel confronts Carla with his suspicions. In the future, Guzmán is interrogated about the missing student.
episodes.title: 66 hours missing

episodes.synopsis: Lu uncovers a secret while helping Cayetana with her fundraiser party. Omar worries about Samuel's fate. Ander's behavior confuses Guzmán.
episodes.title: 84 hours missing

episodes.synopsis: Painful truths and dark secrets are exposed as the students unburden themselves and the circumstances behind Samuel's disappearance are revealed.
episodes.title: 0 hours missing

episodes.synopsis: Carla is interrogated when a student is killed at a party. In the past, she faces Polo in court, Ander has a health worry, and Nadia meets a new suitor.
episodes.title: Carla

episodes.synopsis: Guzmán attempts to make amends. Nadia threatens payback when she and Lu go after the same scholarship. Ander comes clean to his loved ones.
episodes.title: Samuel and Guzmán

episodes.synopsis: Polo is harassed at school. Samuel mulls the police's offer as he and Rebeca become closer. Ander struggles with his treatment.
episodes.title: Cayetana and Valerio

episodes.synopsis: Guzmán confronts Nadia's father. New romances transpire when Lu throws a creative Valentine's Day party. Rebeca struggles with a moneymaking decision.
episodes.title: Lu

episodes.synopsis: Rebeca tries to identify the traitor. A blackout party at the club leads to multiple shocking revelations.
episodes.title: Ander

episodes.synopsis: The Columbia scholarship winner is announced. Nadia makes a momentous decision. Samuel's concern about Carla causes issues between him and Valerio.
episodes.title: Rebeka

episodes.synopsis: As graduation day arrives, the futures of multiple students remain uncertain. Polo begs his mothers to reconsider their recent decision.
episodes.title: Nadia and Omar

episodes.synopsis: The events that transpired the night of the murder unfold. The police interview several eyewitnesses who are ready to point fingers.
episodes.title: Polo

episodes.synopsis: A stern principal and three new students begin at Las Encinas. Omar and Samuel must prove themselves academically while their friends try to help.
episodes.title: The New Order

episodes.synopsis: Prince Phillipe's arrival at the school prompts strict security measures and controversy. Samuel and Omar's towel party leads to new romantic hookups.
episodes.title: Five Seconds

episodes.synopsis: When Prince Phillippe hosts his famous Le Bal party, betrayals ensue. The jealousy between Guzmán and Samuel intensifies. Patrick sparks friction.
episodes.title: When Lies Dance with Temptation

episodes.synopsis: Rebe is confused and hurt by Mencía's mysterious behavior. Much to Ari's chagrin, Benjamín suggests Samuel join the debate team.
episodes.title: I'm a...

episodes.synopsis: Ari and Samuel face off in an important and public debate. After speaking with Ander, Omar struggles with the emotional fallout.
episodes.title: Reintegration

episodes.synopsis: Phillippe worries that his friends are using him for Ambar Lucid performance tickets. Rebe warns Mencía she feels skeptical about Armando's assistance.
episodes.title: I Love You All Wrong

episodes.synopsis: Samuel tells Ari to make her choice while Guzmán plans a romantic date. Cayetana is stunned by a realization. Mencía is backed into a corner.
episodes.title: Before I Go (Part I)

episodes.synopsis: The details of Ari's attack are revealed but the Las Encinas students prove yet again there is always more than meets the eye.
episodes.title: Before I Go (Part II)
